Button Icon File: Font Awesome Solid Icons pack - Arrow pointer
Button States:
Deck A,
Deck B,
Deck C,
Deck D
Purpose: Move the deck focus, for mappings that affect 'Device Target: Focus'

Button States:
Loop,
BeatJump,
Loop Out,
Loop In
Purpose: Set the move mode

Button States:
1/32 beat,
1/16 beat,
1/8 beat,
1/4 beat,
1/2 beat,
1 beat,
2 beats,
4 beats,
8 beats,
16 beats,
32 beats
Purpose: Set the size of the loop

Button Icon/Label: Arrow Left and Right Text Vertical
Button States:
xFine,
Fine,
1/16 beat,
1/8 beat,
1/4 beat,
1/2 beat,
1 beat,
2 beats,
4 beats,
8 beats,
16 beats,
32 beats,
Loop
Purpose: Set the amount that the loop will be moved, or that the play head will beatjump by

Double the BPM/tempo of the track.
Shifted: Halve the BPM/tempo of the track.
Result:
Sets Traktor's 'BPM Lock On' to 'off',
Calls Traktor's 'BPM x2'
Shifted: Calls Traktor's 'BPM /2'

Purpose: Switch to the Rename page
Copy source of Deck A to Deck B
Copy source of Deck B to Deck A
Move loop back, or beatjump back by the specified 'Size Selector'
Move loop forward, or beatjump forward by the specified 'Size Selector'
Make the focussed deck the tempo master

Nudge Live's audio output into time with Traktor's by decreasing Live's tempo for as long as the button is held down. The M4L device facilitates mapping the CCs to Live's API (the LOM) to avoid having to MIDI map these controls on a per-set basis
Result: Calls Live's 'Phase Nudge Down' button via M4L device 'CT6 Params'
Additional Files:
src/live/MIDI Effects/Max MIDI Effect/CT6 Params.adv,
src/live/MIDI Effects/Max MIDI Effect/CT6 Params.amxd,
src/live/Instruments/Instrument Rack/CT6 Rack.adg,
src/live/CT6.als

Purpose: Nudge Live's audio output into time with Traktor's by increasing Live's tempo for as long as the button is held down. The M4L device facilitates mapping the CCs to Live's API (the LOM) to avoid having to MIDI map these controls on a per-set basis
Result: Calls Live's 'Phase Nudge Up' button via M4L device 'CT6 Params'
Additional Files:
src/live/MIDI Effects/Max MIDI Effect/CT6 Params.adv,
src/live/MIDI Effects/Max MIDI Effect/CT6 Params.amxd,
src/live/Instruments/Instrument Rack/CT6 Rack.adg,
src/live/CT6.als

Purpose: Delete the existing loop recording
Set the size for a new loop recording - note: only works if Delete is used to remove the old recording first
Start recording a loop of the specified size
Toggle between recording all audio output and not recording
Remove all clip data - this is much faster than context switching to change Push views to create a new clip and then nudging to get it back in time

Button States:
Track Deck,
Remix Deck,
Stem Deck,
Live Input
Purpose: Change the type of a deck, most useful for toggling between Track Deck and Live Input when playing own material on Deck D.
Toggle on output for slice and hotcue highlighting, to highlight the current playing slice on Push's 16 pad grid
Result: Sets Traktor's 'Modifier 1' (for CT6 - Deck A, CT6 - Deck B)
Additional Files:
src/streamdeck-xl/plugins/streamdeck-midi-plugin/cycle-files/leds-to-push.xml,
src/traktor/CT6 - Deck A.tsi,
src/traktor/CT6 - Deck B.tsi

Purpose: Toggle freeze mode on and off, easier than using the S8 as Supreme Mod makes Freeze a SHIFTed function
Required to achieve 16 slices, as defaults to 8 slices after freeze is engaged
Useful for isolating stabs and drum hits
Stop playback of the focussed deck. Use after exiting freeze mode.
Play Deck in Reverse (SHIFTable)
Result: Calls Traktor's ‘Reverse Playback On’ (+ SHIFT = Flux mode)

Button States:
Deck A,
Deck B,
Deck D,
Loop Red
Purpose: Display only - shows Capture Source selected by S8 (note: only appropriate flavours of decks can be selected and not the remix deck itself)
Set slot modifier value for Keylock/FX/Monitor/Punch toggles. Mouse click of slot is via Bome.
Result: Sets Traktor M2=0 = Select Remix Slot 1

Purpose:
Select the remix slot by clicking it, for slot sample-specific operations.
Selection of slot 'lane' for Keylock/FX/Monitor/Punch toggles handled separately by CC 81.
Result: Sets Traktor's 'Modifier 2' (for CT6 - Stream Deck XL) to '0' ('0' = Slot 1-1, '1' = Slot 1-2, '2' = Slot 1-3, '3' = Slot 1-4)

Purpose: Optimise layout for mixing
Result: Sets Traktor's 'Layout Selector' to configured 'Decks' view
Additional Files:
src/traktor/CT6 - App Export.tsi,
src/traktor/CT6 - Streamdeck XL.tsi

Purpose: Slot Punch Off/On. Slot is determined by slot modifier value.
Doubles BPM of selected slot. Slot is determined by slot modifier value.
Remix deck launch quantise toggle

Double BPM of selected slot. Slot is determined by slot modifier value.
Shifted: Halves BPM of selected slot. Slot is determined by slot modifier value.

Double the length of the (a) selected sample in the (b) selected slot, exposing more of the loaded slot sample or adding silence after it.
SHIFTed: Halve the length of the (a) selected sample in the (b) selected slot, cropping the loaded slot sample.
Result: Halves the size of sample in the selected slot. Uses the value of Traktor's 'Modifier 2' to determine which slot to act upon.

Purpose: Move up one row (hold to repeat action)
Move to top row (SHIFTed function)
Select a browser folder
Move down one row (hold to repeat action)
Move to bottom row (SHIFTed function)

Purpose: Load selected track into Deck A

Button Icon/Label: Square with highlight in TR corner
Purpose: Load selected track into Deck B

Button Icon/Label: Square with highlight in BL corner
Purpose: Load selected track (Remix Set) into Deck C (Remix Deck)

Button Icon File: Stream Deck Icon Library > Elgato Logo Icons (White) > Elgato logo (White)
Purpose: Switch to Home profile
Open "/Users/Username/Documents/control-traktor/automator/Launch Traktor.app"
Open Traktor’s preferences
Toggle Traktor’s Tool Tips (SHIFTable)
Result: Calls Traktor's ‘Tool Tips On’ (show / + SHIFT = hide)

Purpose: Sync external app with Traktor
Play a metronome on the cue channel to aid playing of riffs.
Load Bome translator file for mouse clicks
Launch CT6 set

Button Icon File: Stream Deck Icon Library - Elgato Icons (White) - Stream Deck Mk2 Icon (Outlined, White)
Purpose: Open Stream Deck app
Take a screenshot of each of the Stream Deck pages
Result: Opens Stream Deck config (on external display), navigates to each page in turn and runs the macOS screencapture script in Terminal (19 actions in total)

Purpose: Open Terminal app

Open VS Code
Quit Terminal app
Access 'Audio MIDI Setup' which is where the IAC Driver is configured, for the 'Daw2StreamDeck' and 'StreamDeck2Daw' connectors

Purpose: Provide SHIFTed functions, these are denoted with underlined text
Result: Sets Traktor's 'Modifier 1' (for CT6 - Stream Deck XL) to ‘1’. As Stream Deck MIDI button can only have one MIDI Out port, Bome routes the MIDI from Bome MIDI Translator 1 Virtual In to Traktor Virtual Input.
